sn23.46:1.2: Ekamantam nisinnam kho ayasmantam radham bhagava etadavoca:
sn23.46:1.3: “yo kho, radha, nirodhadhammo; tatra te chando pahatabbo, rago pahatabbo, chandarago pahatabbo.
sn23.46:1.5: Rupam kho, radha, nirodhadhammo; tatra te chando pahatabbo, rago pahatabbo, chandarago pahatabbo.
sn23.46:1.9: vinnanam nirodhadhammo; tatra te chando pahatabbo, rago pahatabbo, chandarago pahatabbo.
sn23.46:1.10: Yo kho, radha, nirodhadhammo; tatra te chando pahatabbo, rago pahatabbo, chandarago pahatabbo”ti.
